title: There shall be green belt of 100 m
clause_text: There shall be green belt of 100 m. around the boundary of the Hazardous Chemical Industries as shown on plan attached with the report of authority.
section: Development around Hazardous Industries (Chemical Zone Areas)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
